title: Context-Based Problem-Solving Skill Enhancement Program for Vocational College Students

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and experience in solving simple problems
context.additional_context: Problem-solving training linking VR simulations with real-world job scenarios in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can contextually analyze mathematical problems occurring in real workplace environments and propose at least three solution strategies.
Learners systematically solve complex mathematical problems by collaborating with team members in a VR simulation environment, completing the process at least 80% of the time.
Learners can apply at least two problem-solving strategies presented in the formative assessment to real-world cases.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
